title: Nature's Soundscapes - Country Mountains, Fields & Streams
description: From Farmland, Rural Forests & Mountains to the countryside of Italy, Nature's Soundscapes contains many essential habitats of real life & sound types needed for video games & movies. Experience new & exciting natural locations.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Video Demo


Experience new & exciting natural locations captured across the rolling hills of Tennessee, Cades Cove, the Smoky Mountains, Breckenridge Mountains, Natchez Trace, North Carolina, New York & the countryside of Italy. Nature's Soundscapes brings you the sounds of the organic world in both long form & seamlessly loop-able file format giving you extended length, maximum versatility and time saving files.


You may also be interested in:

Organic Nature Sounds

Sci-Fi Evolution

Epic Nature Loops

Phantom Magic Sounds


What’s Included?


This pack has plenty of options to help your game background & ambience sound come to life. The Nature's Soundscapes - Country Mountains, Fields & Streams ambience sound effects library is organized into popular sound genre folders that make it easier to create outstanding & realistic nature ambience experiences in the following folder structure: Birds, Countryside, Creek, Forest, Mountain, Lake, Night, River, Rain, Stream, Waterfall, Wind.


Plus Comes with the “Epic Nature Loops 2” Sound Library


Nature's Soundscapes - Country Mountains, Fields & Streams comes with the second installment of the Epic Nature Loops sound effects series, Epic Nature Loops 2. It’s a stout curated ambient sound pack collection of over 100+ game ready nature loops derived from Nature's Soundscapes - Country Mountains, Fields & Streams ambience sound recordings.


UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata

All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant & is organized into categories to make it easier to navigate with understandable folder structures. Has extensive metadata embed in the files using soundminer metadata to help you find the right sound at the right time.


All of the 90 nature ambience files are designed to make your life easier, production workflow faster and delivered in 96k/24bit .WAV file format to maintain top-notch audio fidelity. Nature's Soundscapes - Country Mountains, Fields & Streams ambience sound’s premixed audio is ready to drag and drop into your game or film. 


Product details: 

  • Total of 193 files!
  • 90 lightly edited long field recordings
  • Plus 103 nature loops (Epic Nature Loops 2)
  • All in 96k/24bit .wav
  • 11GB of audio samples
  • Includes Soundminer metadata for easy search capability
  • UCS Compliant
  • 6 hours of ambience sound
  • 11 bird sounds - Sandhill Crane, Cardinal, Hermit Thrush, Hawk, Chickadee, Scarlet, Warbler, Robbins, Overbird
  • 3 farm & countrysides of Italy
  • 13 creeks recorded at Cades Cove & Middle Tennessee
  • 15 forest - Italy summer, insects, mountains, birds
  • 5 mountain & lake ambiences - general, wind, busy wildlife
  • 10 grassland & night - insects, bush crickets, peepers, American toads, swamp
  • 7 rain & thunderstorm - tin roof, water on plants, on fabric, calm soft rain, storm
  • 6 river recordings - river close, distant, steady
  • 4 water streams - light, trickles, steady, close
  • 9 waterfall - massive to small, close, distant, rushing water, water flows
  • 7 general wind ambience loops - mountains, wildlife, activity, busy, mountain top, wind, heavy
  • Plus 103 nature loops (Epic Nature Loops 2)
  • All sound effects are youtube friendly & royalty-free
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
  • Designed specifically for games, film, tv, video, motion graphics & commercial productions
  • Set the audio background for any natural environment
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Over 11GB of nature ambiences
  •  6 hours of ambiance sounds.
  •  Includes 90 lightly edited ambience files 
  • In addition, you get 103 nature loops.

Number of Audio Cues: 193

Sample rate / bit rate: 96k/24bit .wav

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 6h

Supported Development Platforms:
